emotional_regulation.title: Emotional Regulation & Intensity

citations.name: The Personality Inventory for DSM-5 (PID-5)
citations.description: Assesses maladaptive personality traits including emotional lability, anxiousness, and separation insecurity.

citations.name: Affective Reactivity Index (ARI)
citations.description: Evaluates chronic irritability, temper outbursts, and emotional threshold.

citations.name: Psychology Tools: Anxiety, Anger, Grief (Modality)
citations.description: Frameworks for emotional tolerance, distress survival, and somatic regulation.

emotional_regulation.disclaimer: This assessment is non-diagnostic. It uses structural concepts from the PID-5 and ARI to help you reflect on your emotional reactivity patterns.

anxiety_overthinking.title: Anxiety & Anticipatory Stress

citations.name: Severity Measure for Generalized Anxiety Disorder
citations.description: Inspired by the GAD-7, mapping excessive worry, restlessness, and physiological hyperarousal.

citations.name: Severity Measure for Social Anxiety Disorder
citations.description: Evaluates fear, avoidance, and distress in social or performance situations.

citations.name: PROMIS Emotional Distress - Anxiety
citations.description: Measures fear, anxious misery, and hyperarousal.

anxiety_overthinking.disclaimer: Inspired by clinical anxiety measures to help map your cognitive distortions and avoidance behaviors. Not a substitute for a clinical diagnosis.

burnout_career.title: Burnout & Functional Depletion

citations.name: WHODAS 2.0 (World Health Organization Disability Schedule)
citations.description: A comprehensive tool to assess health and disability, focusing on functional impairment in daily life and work.

citations.name: PHQ-15 Somatic Symptom Severity Scale
citations.description: Tracks physical symptoms (fatigue, sleep disruption) that often accompany severe burnout and emotional exhaustion.

burnout_career.disclaimer: Focuses on identifying functional disruption and somatic fatigue based on WHO and PHQ frameworks.

relationship_patterns.title: Relationship & Attachment Patterns

citations.name: Core Cultural Formulation Interview (CFI)
citations.description: Analyzes how cultural, relational, and social contexts influence identity and coping.

citations.name: Severity Measure for Separation Anxiety Disorder
citations.description: Maps attachment fears, fears of abandonment, and distress upon separation from attachment figures.

relationship_patterns.disclaimer: Uses cultural and attachment-based frameworks to map interpersonal friction. It does not diagnose attachment disorders.

core_mood_depression.title: Core Mood & Heaviness

citations.name: Severity Measure for Depression (Adapted PHQ-9)
citations.description: Inspired by the gold-standard tool for mapping anhedonia, lethargy, and mood collapse.

citations.name: PROMIS Emotional Distress - Depression
citations.description: Measures negative mood, views of self, and social cognition.

core_mood_depression.disclaimer: Designed to map periods of emotional heaviness. If you are experiencing thoughts of self-harm, please use our crisis resources immediately.
